title: 387.212 CONTINGENT FUND TO ADVANCE AND REIMBURSE EXPENSES.
text: The board of county commissioners in any county may create a sheriff's contingent fund and may credit thereto not more than $10,000. The money in such fund may be used for the advancement and reimbursement of expenses of the sheriff and the sheriff's office. Such money shall be disbursed by the county treasurer in accordance with rules and regulations prescribed by the board. Any balance remaining at the end of the year shall be transferred to the revenue fund.
